title: All-Star Ballot Submissions
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to talk their All-Star ballot submissions including how position distinctions impact starters. Plus, they break down the players deserving of a reserve spot, how many games you should need to play to get into the All-Star Game and the Celtics’ poor shooting percentages.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Who Do The Guys Have On Their All-Star Game Rosters?
